CSE001.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
CSE001.description: This comprehensive course covers all essential data structures and algorithms with detailed notes, solved problems, and exam strategies. Designed specifically for VITB students, it includes PYQs from the last 5 years with detailed solutions.

modulesList.title: Introduction to Data Structures
modulesList.topics: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues, Time Complexity Analysis

modulesList.title: Trees and Graphs
modulesList.topics: Binary Trees, BST, AVL Trees, Graph Representation, BFS, DFS

modulesList.title: Sorting Algorithms
modulesList.topics: Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort

modulesList.title: Searching Algorithms
modulesList.topics: Linear Search, Binary Search, Hashing, Collision Resolution

modulesList.title: Dynamic Programming
modulesList.topics: Memoization, Tabulation, LCS, Knapsack, Matrix Chain Multiplication

modulesList.title: Greedy Algorithms
modulesList.topics: Activity Selection, Huffman Coding, Dijkstra's Algorithm

CSE002.title: Web Development Bootcamp
CSE002.description: Complete full-stack web development course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

modulesList.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
modulesList.topics: Semantic HTML, CSS Grid, Flexbox, Responsive Design

modulesList.title: Backend with Node.js
modulesList.topics: Express, REST APIs, Authentication, Database Integration

CSE003.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
CSE003.description: Learn machine learning from basics to advanced concepts including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications.

modulesList.title: ML Fundamentals
modulesList.topics: What is ML, Types of Learning, Applications

modulesList.title: Supervised Learning
modulesList.topics: Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees

CSE004.title: Database Management Systems
CSE004.description: Comprehensive database course covering SQL, NoSQL, normalization, indexing, transactions, and database design principles.

CSE005.title: Operating Systems
CSE005.description: Deep dive into operating systems concepts including process management, memory management, file systems, and concurrency.

CSE006.title: Computer Networks
CSE006.description: Complete coverage of computer networks from OSI model to TCP/IP, routing, switching, and network security.

CSE007.title: Advanced Calculus
CSE007.description: Master complex calculus concepts with step-by-step solutions and practical applications in engineering and physics.

modulesList.title: Integration
modulesList.topics: Definite and Indefinite Integrals, Techniques of Integration

modulesList.title: Series and Sequences
modulesList.topics: Power Series, Taylor Series, Convergence Tests

CSE008.title: Organic Chemistry
CSE008.description: Comprehensive coverage of organic chemistry principles, reactions, and mechanisms with laboratory applications.

modulesList.title: Reaction Mechanisms
modulesList.topics: SN1, SN2, E1, E2, Addition, Elimination
